## Description
Create a renderer that outputs Vue 3 components from wiremd AST.

## Features
- Generate `.vue` Single File Components
- Support Composition API
- Include TypeScript types (`.vue` with `<script setup lang="ts">`)
- Proper props handling
- Emit events for interactive components
- Support Vue 3 features (Teleport, Suspense where applicable)

## Example Output
```vue
<template>
  <form class="wiremd-form">
    <input v-model="name" type="text" placeholder="Name" />
    <button @click="handleSubmit">Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue';

const name = ref('');

const handleSubmit = () => {
  console.log('Submitted:', name.value);
};
</script>
```

## Priority
Medium

title: Support component composition and reuse
body:
## Description
Add syntax for defining reusable components and composing them.

## Proposed Syntax

### Define Component
```markdown
<!-- Define in components/button.md -->
## Button {#component}
[{{text}}]{.{{variant}}}
```

### Use Component
```markdown
<!-- Use in main mockup -->
<Button text="Submit" variant="primary" />
<Button text="Cancel" variant="secondary" />
```

## Features
- Component library support
- Props/parameters
- Default values
- Slot/children support
- Component variants

## Implementation
- Component registry
- Template interpolation
- Recursive rendering

## Priority
Medium

## Labels
enhancement, components, reusability
